GATE Developer/Embedded Version 7.0 release (February 2012)

GATE Developer/Embedded version 7.0 introduces a number of new features, including:

  • a rewritten plugin manager supporting the installation of new plugins from remote update sites directly from the GATE Developer GUI
  • the first public release of the new JAPE Plus execution engine for JAPE grammars
  • a new suite of tools for biomedical text processing
  • improved support for right-to-left languages in the document editor

... and many more improvements and bug fixes. Full details can be found in the changelog in the user guide.

The GATE Developer/Embedded package is available for download from http://gate.ac.uk/download/.
